law.text: The commissioner and employees or authorized representatives of the department shall, for traveling necessitated by the discharge of official duties, be reimbursed for transportation actually paid for, not exceeding the regular fare over the most direct route, and meals and lodging actually paid for.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1804, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 181, Part 15, sec. 79, effective April 4, 1994. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1954. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4925.
